title: AI-Based Self-Directed English Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English reading and writing skills, foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customized learning environment using AI tools for science field professionals' practical English enhancement program

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans using personalized feedback from AI-based platforms.
Over 90% of learners can identify personalized language usage patterns and suggest improvements via AI analysis tools in English writing and presentation skills.
Over 75% of learners can form a sense of social connectedness to maintain learning motivation through AI learning activities based on self-determination theory.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
